subcategory.name: Content Sections
subcategory.description: Content section examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS content section and blog post examples to include long-form content on your website, such as your company blog, content universe, or feature sections that need a few more words. These content examples are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
